item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 5, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Earth's clouds are shrinking, boosting global warming (112 points | 60 comments)

24. Kerosene did not save the sperm whale (2024) (177 points | 60 comments)
